description: Details required for Condition 8 (Materials) of planning permission 21/04089/FUL (Demolition of existing stables and barn, erection of a single storey dwelling and replacement detached stable with associated parking and landscaping (Amended Landscape Visual Impact Assessment Received))
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Insufficient details of the proposed Siberian Larch Cladding stain have been submitted and no details of the Solar Roof Tiles have been submitted contrary to the requirements of Condition 8 of planning permission ref: 21/04089/FUL (Allowed at Appeal ref: APP/Z5630/W/22/3300875).

The application proposes material amendments to planning permission ref: 21/04089/FUL (Allowed at Appeal ref: APP/Z5630/W/22/3300875) by removing solar roof tiles from the scheme. Such amendments cannot be made through a discharge of condition application.
